Detailed Description

XHTMLTemplate extention. Representents the Body tag of an XHTMLPage with its contents and its parameters.

Definition at line 37 of file XHTMLBodyTemplate.php.

XHTMLBodyTemplate::__construct (   ) 
 

instanciates a XHTMLBodyTemplate. Sets a default skeleton and initialises XHTMLTemplates for tags named TAG_CONTENT and TAG_PARAMS

XHTMLBodyTemplate::AddContent (  $  content  ) 
 

Adds raw XHTML $content to the current content of the body. Content of the page is value associated to the tag named TAG_CONTENT.

Raw XHML $content may be valid.

Parameters:
$content the raw XHTML to be added

Definition at line 48 of file XHTMLBodyTemplate.php.

References Template::AddToTag().

XHTMLBodyTemplate::AddParams (  $  params  ) 
 

Adds raw XHTML $params to the current parameters of the body XHTML tag. Parameters of the body tag is value associated to the tag named TAG_PARAMS.

Raw XHML $params may be valid.

Parameters:
$params the raw XHTML to be added

XHTMLBodyTemplate::SetContent (  $  content  )

Raw XHML $content may be valid.
